properties.name: ostara.client.agent-url
properties.description: The URL of the Ostara Agent.

properties.name: ostara.client.api-key
properties.description: The API key to use when communicating with the Ostara Agent.

properties.name: ostara.client.application-name
properties.description: The name of the application to register with the Ostara Agent, if not set the value of `spring.application.name` will be used.

properties.name: ostara.client.runner-interval-seconds
properties.description: The interval in seconds for the [OstaraClientRunner] to run and register the application with the Ostara Agent.
